text: ✨✨✨ Cattleya, a generative orchid artwork, will be released on Art Blocks on May 20, 2022 at 12:00pm EDT. 300 tokens will be available to mint in a Dutch auction. The work will also be on display at Taipei Dangdai Art Fair from May 20-22. ✨✨✨ Recent Writings: How My Drawings Destroyed Me: The rocky road to nurturing creative confidence and finding one’s voice Recent Press: CBS This Morning features Snell and his new sculpture Attis in a segment on art and artificial intelligence. Artnet names "Art in the Age of Artificial Intelligence" one of their Editor's Picks for Feburary. "Ben Snell considers mankind’s age-old fascination with the idea of intelligent machines..." Dio, a Definitive AI Sculpture in Neural Magazine "But Snell goes a step further: once the sculpture is conceived and formalised, he grinds the computer to dust and builds the sculpture out if it. He freezes the computational clock in its most daring form, which will never be recalculated by the same machine again, but fully amalgamated in its own materiality...."
